snippet: Although income dropped in the last fiscal year, the automaker said a new model lineup would help it further boost profit to $21.5 billion in the year through March 2013.
abstract: Toyota Motor reports net income for the fiscal year through March was 283.6 billion yen ($3.6 billion), down 31 percent from a year earlier; says a new model lineup will help its profit more than double to 760 billion yen($9.5 billion) in the current year through March 2013.
lead_paragraph: Although income dropped in the last fiscal year, the automaker said a new model lineup would help it further boost profit to $21.5 billion in the year through March 2013.

headline.main: Toyota Projects Profit to Double in Fiscal Year
headline.print_headline: Toyota Slips, But Predicts A Doubling Of Profits
